thread.title: Excellent hotel with an even beter service
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel with an even beter service - Review of Grand Hotel Francais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Johan d
title: Excellent hotel with an even beter service
text:
This hotel has the best service of all the hotels I've stayed in. They are very friendly, accommodating, and really go the extra mile.
We arrived way too early in Paris, and check-in wasn't until 14:00. After calling them at 7 in the morning, they told us to come to the hotel so we could drop our suitcases there while we enjoy the city. They helped us even further by stating that we could check in at 10:00.
The rooms themselves are a bit small, but very clean and tidy. There's a safe in the room for your things, two complementary bottle of water, and the breakfast is good as well. The wifi works well in the entire hotel. Near to the metro station where you can be all over Paris in minutes.
Definitely recommend this hotel!
Room Tip: Go for a higher floor, away from the main road See more room tips
